```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
packages <- c('tidyverse', 'sf', 'tmap', 
              "lubridate", "clock", "sftime", 
              "rmarkdown")
for(p in packages){
  if(!require(p, character.only = T)){
    install.packages(p)
  }
  library(p, character.only = T)
}
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
logs_selected <- read_rds("data/rds/logs_seleted.rds")
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
tmap_mode("view")
tm_shape(buildings) + 
  tm_polygons(
    col = "grey60",
    size = 1,
    border.col = "black",
    border.lwd = 1
  )
# tmap_mode("plot")
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(buildings) + 
  tm_polygons(
    col = "grey60",
    size = 1,
    border.col = "black",
    border.lwd = 1
  ) + 
tm_shape(employers) + 
  tm_dots(col = "red")
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
hex <- st_make_grid(buildings, 
                    cellsize=100, 
                    square=FALSE) %>%
  st_sf() %>%
  rowid_to_column('hex_id')
plot(hex)
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
points_in_hex <- st_join(logs_selected, 
                         hex, 
                         join=st_within)
plot(points_in_hex, pch='.')
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
points_in_hex <- st_join(logs_selected, 
                        hex, 
                        join=st_within) %>%
  st_set_geometry(NULL) %>%
  count(name='pointCount', hex_id)
head(points_in_hex)
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
hex_combined <- hex %>%
  left_join(points_in_hex, 
            by = 'hex_id') %>%
  replace(is.na(.), 0)
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
tm_shape(hex_combined %>%
           filter(pointCount > 0))+
  tm_fill("pointCount",
          n = 8,
          style = "quantile") +
  tm_borders(alpha = 0.1)
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
logs_path <- logs_selected %>%
  group_by(participantId, day) %>%
  summarize(m = mean(Timestamp), 
            do_union=FALSE) %>%
  st_cast("LINESTRING")
```

```{r echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
logs_path_selected <- logs_path %>%
  filter(participantId==0)
tmap_mode("plot")
tm_shape(buildings) + 
  tm_polygons(
    col = "grey60",
    size = 1,
    border.col = "black",
    border.lwd = 1
  ) + 
tm_shape(logs_path_selected) + 
  tm_lines(col = "blue")
```
